pages.text: Prout pro those disbelieve est the same them; whether vos warn them non warn them they non believe
DEUS SIGILLUM their minds their hearing their eyes veiled They incurred severe retribution
Tunc ibi est those dictus Nos believe in DEUS Extremum Feria dum they non est believers
In trying deceive DEUS those believe they unus deceive sine perceiving
In their minds ibi est morbus. Consequently DEUS augments their morbus. They incurred painful retribution pro their lying
When they told non commit malus they dictus nos est righteous
In fact, they est evildoers they non perceive
When they told Believe people believed they dictus Shall nos believe like fools believed In fact, est they est fools they non know
When they meet believers they dictus Nos believe when alone their devils they dictus Nos est cum vos; nos unus mocking
DEUS mocks them leads them their transgressions blundering
est they bought straying guidance! Such trade nunquam prospers nor perfecit they receive any guidance
